message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll compromise a bit, but I'm still not happy with a 60/40 split. How about we split it 45/55?
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours
This is my final offer. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I won't go any lower than this.
I'm not backing down, my offer is still better for me
